nodes.text: A man with a gravely voice represented a crime syndicate on the planet Bothawui during the Galactic Civil War. In 3.5 ABY, he attempted to negotiate the purchase of the contents of a certain briefcase from a courier representing another crime syndicate, offering 10,000 credits upfront.
The adventure offers the possible scenario that "gravely voice" was responsible for the death of the courier's Rodian partner.
